snippet: National Australia Bank Ltd., one of Australia's biggest lenders, on Thursday posted a 16 percent increase in half-year profit to 2.86 billion Australian dollars ($2.67 billion), helped by a reduction in bad debts and an improving British economy....

headline.print_headline: National Australia Bank Posts 16 Pct Profit Hike
headline.main: National Australia Bank Posts 16 Pct Profit Hike

lead_paragraph: National Australia Bank Ltd., one of Australia's biggest lenders, on Thursday posted a 16 percent increase in half-year profit to 2.86 billion Australian dollars ($2.67 billion), helped by a reduction in bad debts and an improving British economy.
